title: And now the states fall
author: VD
content_html:
The Obamanations were whistling in the dark about how the Electoral College means that the presidential election is tabulated state-by-state, which rendered all the national poll results meaningless.

So much for that argument:

Obama/Biden 217
—————-
157 Solid 60 Leaning

McCain/Palin 227
—————-
172 Solid 55 Leaning

Toss Up 94

Ed Whelan notes that this is an 85-vote swing in a single month. If Obama continues on his self-destructive path, this could be a complete reverse of the Clinton-landslide I was expecting. Good humor indeed!

So much
for that argument:

Ed Whelan notes that this is an 85-vote swing in a single month.  If Obama continues on his self-destructive path, this could be a complete reverse of the Clinton-landslide I was expecting.  Good humor indeed!
